original_text: Then another angel came out of the temple in heaven, and he too had a sharp sickle.
korean_text: 또 다른 천사가 하늘에 있는 성전에서 나오는데 역시 예리한 낫을 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: Then another angel came out of the temple in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다른 천사가 하늘 성전에서 나왔습니다

sentences.original_text: he too had a sharp sickle
